Title: Asp.Net Watermark Textbox custom server control
Description:
Its a asp.net customer server control that allows you to simply use it on any web page, as you normally use a textbox control.

It uses JavaScript (jQuery) and CSS to achieve the desired functionality and it's having inbuilt required field validator.

The best part is its simple, easy to implement and re-usable.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Its a asp.net customer server control that allows you to simply use it on any web page, as you normally use a textbox control.

It uses JavaScript (jQuery) and CSS to achieve the desired functionality and it's having inbuilt required field validator.

The best part is its simple, easy to implement and re-usable.

See documentation tab for more details on usage.
